Class MTGCardQuery

extends java.lang.Object
    Top-level class, provides a static way to search for cards.
    Author:
    ForOhForError

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Card> search(java.lang.String query)
        Returns a list of card objects that match the query. The query should be formatted using scryfall's syntax: https://www.scryfall.com/docs/syntax
        Parameters:
        query - The query to match cards to
        Returns:
        A list of card objects that match the query.

        Returns:
